a) Tourist Statistics:
Passenger  arrival  reports  generated  by  Electronic  Travel  Authorization  System
(ETA) compiled by the Department of Immigration and Emigration.
b) Excursionist Statistics:
Passenger  arrival reports  compiled  by the  Department  of Immigration  and
Emigration
c) Accommodation Statistics:
Monthly reports obtained by the Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority from
the registered accommodation establishments.
d) Passenger Statistics:
Passenger  arrival  and  departure reports compiled  by the  Department  of
Immigration and Emigration.
e) Air Traffic Statistics:
Quarterly returns obtained by the Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority from
the scheduled airlines, which operate flights to Sri Lanka.
f)  Statistics on Official Tourist Receipts:
Information calculated form the Survey of Departing Foreign Tourists from Sri Lanka.
